languages.text: Enemies suffer a −10% penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with ranged attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.
languages.original_text: Для противников {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} по {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воину{/g} в дальнем бою (в том числе при нанесении {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по площади{/g}) уменьшается на 10% за каждого противника в радиусе 1 клетки от воина. Эффект суммируется до 3 раз.

traits.locale_text: Enemies suffer a -15% penalty to their Hit Chance with ranged attacks (including area effect attacks) against the Fighter for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Fighter. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Для противников шанс попадания по воину в дальнем бою (в том числе при нанесении атак по площади) уменьшается на 15% за каждого противника в радиусе 1 клетки от воина. Эффект суммируется до 3 раз.
Для противников шанс попадания по воину в дальнем бою (в том числе при нанесении атак по площади) уменьшается на 15% за каждого противника в радиусе 1 клетки от воина. Эффект суммируется до 3 раз.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}周围1格内每有一名敌人，所有敌人对战士的远程攻击（包括{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}）的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}都会受到-10%减值，此效果最多叠加3层。
languages.original_text: Enemies suffer a −10% penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with ranged attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 战士周围1格内每有一名敌人，所有敌人对战士的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击（包括范围攻击）的{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}都会受到-15%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。最多叠加3层。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}周围1格内每有一名敌人，所有敌人对战士的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击（包括{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}）的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}都会受到-10%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，此效果最多叠加3层。

languages.text: Los enemigos sufren una penalización de −10 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} de los ataques a distancia (incluidos los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}) que realicen contra el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} por cada enemigo situado en un radio de 1 casilla en torno al guerrero. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffer a −10% penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with ranged attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} de los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} (incluidos los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}) que realicen contra el guerrero por cada enemigo situado en un radio de 1 casilla en torno al guerrero. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.

languages.text: Feinde haben einen Abzug von −10 % auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} mit Fernkampfangriffen (einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g}) gegen den Krieger für jeden Feind in einem Radius von 1 Feld um den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g}. Bis zu 3-mal stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffer a −10% penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with ranged attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Feinde erleiden einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 % auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} (einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g}) gegen den Krieger für jeden Feind in einem Radius von 1 Feld um den Krieger. Bis zu 3 Mal stapelbar.

languages.text: Une pénalité de −10 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} des ennemis qui lancent des attaques à distance (y compris des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}) contre le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} pour chaque ennemi situé dans un rayon de 1 case autour de lui. Cumulable 3 fois.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffer a −10% penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with ranged attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -15 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger des coups{/g} des ennemis qui lancent des attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} (y compris des attaques de zone) contre le Combattant pour chaque ennemi situé dans un rayon de 1 case autour du Combattant. Cumulable 3 fois.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の周囲1セル以内にいる敵1体につき、敵はファイターに対する遠隔攻撃（{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}も含む）の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に−10%のペナルティを受ける。最大3回までスタックする。
languages.original_text: Enemies suffer a −10% penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with ranged attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の周囲1セル以内にいる敵1体につき、敵はファイターに対する遠隔攻撃（{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}も含む）の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に−10%のペナルティを受ける。最大3回までスタックする。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の周囲1セル以内にいる敵1体につき、敵はファイターに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔攻撃{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}も含む）の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に-10%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。最大3回まで累積する。

languages.text: Düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}'ya karşı yapacakları menzilli saldırıların ({g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g} da dâhil) {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığına{/g} Savaşçı'nın 1 hücre uzağında bulunan her düşman için −%10 ceza puanı alırlar. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffer a −10% penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with ranged attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.
